metadata.synopsis: This is a fallback one-liner. In case the Player manages to approach her an initiate dialog in the Circus in Wyrm's crossing. Korrilla gives a cryptic one-liner to the player. No Hasmet node is needed, as she teleports away right after.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go to -81; 45; -35 in BGO_Main_A.Open ReCon and use "statusapply INVISIBILITY"approach Korrilla (located at -91; 45; -28) and click on her to initiate dialog.

0.speaker: Korrilla
0.text: Soon... I promise. Patience is one of few virtues worth holding.
